txt.en: 'What are you doing?'
Instance: The Madness In His Eyes
'We can still hurt you.'
'Our pawn has teeth.'
Prevent Azagath from inflicting great harm upon Silirtas
'See you not the madness in his eyes?'
Prevent Azagath from inflicting great harm upon Silirtas
'You cannot prevent this.'
Go to check on Silirtas
Stand your ground

'If the Thardúth were truly once of my people, I want to do my part in sealing them away, [placeholder]!\n\n'I and Corudan will set the Narghâk to the right of the entrance. You and Sigileth can place the Narghâk on the left side. We will seal the entrance to Utug-bûr and these fallen Kintai will no longer trouble the world!'
'This is beyond your power.'
Listen to the threatening voice within your mind
Check on the group placing the Narghâk on the other side
Awaken Silirtas from the enchantment that keeps her from moving
Prevent Azagath from inflicting great harm upon Silirtas
In desperation you call her name, but Silirtas remains frozen, unaware of the evil that threatens her.
TBD - Blah!
At the urging of his Thardúth masters, Azagath intends to do great harm to your friends.
Grieving that the Thardúth had their origins as ancient Kintai, Silirtas greatly desires to do her part in sealing them away.
At the urging of his Thardúth masters, Azagath intends to do great harm to your friends.
You and Sigileth have volunteered to place the Narghâk on the left side of the entrance to Utug-bûr.
At the urging of his Thardúth masters, Azagath intends to do great harm to your friends.
You and Sigileth have volunteered to place the Narghâk on the left side of the entrance to Utug-bûr.
The Thardúth turn their attention elsewhere in the battle. The sorcerous exhaustion that troubled you has been lifted.
You and Sigileth have volunteered to place the Narghâk on the left side of the entrance to Utug-bûr.
A sense of exhaustion has overcome you once again, as happened earlier when you journeyed within Maurûsh.
The ethereal voice speaks threatening words from within the confines of your mind.
Silirtas is in grave danger! She must awaken at once!
Talk to Silirtas outside Utug-bûr
Place Narghâk to the left side of the entrance to Utug-bûr (0/3)
Place Narghâk to the left side of the entrance to Utug-bûr (1/3)
Place Narghâk to the left side of the entrance to Utug-bûr (2/3)
'Sigileth! No!'
Placed Narghâk to the left side of the entrance (1/3)
Placed Narghâk to the left side of the entrance (2/3)
Placed Narghâk to the left side of the entrance (3/3)
'Nooooo! Silirtas!'
You need to seal the entrance to Utug-bûr before the Thardúth emerge and levy their full power against you.
'Azagath! Now you die!'
Frozen, unmoving figures stand near at hand
